text: Jürgen Degenhardt, real name Hans-Jürgen Degenhardt, (21 October 1930 in Dresden – 1 August 2014Ostthüringer Zeitung vom 7. August 2014) was a German songwriter, actor, director and author.Jürgen Degenhardt. In Kürschners Deutscher Literatur-Kalender 2014/2015: volume I: A-O. volume II: P-Z., Walter de Gruyter Incorporated, 2014, , . He was considered the most successful German writer of musical comedies.Thüringer Allgemeine, accessdate 28 March 2019.
